author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO PASSING SOUTH OF THE BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA...
summary: ...IVO PASSING SOUTH OF THE BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA... As of 8:00 AM MST Fri Aug 08 the center of Ivo was located near 20.7, -110.1 with movement WNW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO PASSING SOUTH OF THE BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA... As of 8:00 AM MST Fri Aug 08 the center of Ivo was located near 20.7, -110.1 with movement WNW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
